txt.en: You turn the pages and come to an account of the fall of Moria. It is grim reading.
You think about what you have read and mourn the losses of so many in the depths of Moria.
You turn the pages and become immersed in the chronicle of the 'Fall of Moria.'
You have chosen to read from the Chronicle of Events concerning the Fall of Moria.
